execution_quality: Agent provided no analysis or research; user identified a discrepancy between expected (read-only) and actual (read and write) permissions and requested investigation.
work_category: Configuration clarification regarding GitHub Actions workflow setup permissions and org-level installation scope mismatch investigation.
summary: Agent failed to help investigate a GitHub configuration discrepancy where org-level installation shows unexpected 'read and write' permissions despite expectations. The user requested research assistance to understand the permission scope mismatch but received no analysis from the agent.
follow_up_pattern: User suspects a configuration error or documentation mismatch and requested deeper investigation into org-level GitHub installation permission scope.
